pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## pyBOAT - A Biological Oscillations Analysis Toolkit ##Tools for time-frequency analysis of noisy non-stationary signals with Morlet Wavelets.See the [github repo](https://github.com/tensionhead/pyBOAT) for general documentation or[this paper](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.04.29.067744v3)for more details.### Features ###* Optimal sinc filter* Fourier analysis* Wavelet analysis * Ridge detection* Phase extraction* Amplitude estimation* Synthetic signal generator* Ensemble/Summary statistics
